Application.GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

AudioLibrary.Clean.description: Cleans the audio library from non-existent items

AudioLibrary.Export.description: Exports all items from the audio library

params.description: Whether to export the data into one or multiple files
params.name: singlefile

params.description: Whether to export thumbnails and fanart images
params.name: images

params.description: Whether to overwrite existing exported files
params.name: overwrite

params.description: Path to the directory to where the data should be exported
params.name: path

AudioLibrary.GetAlbumDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific album

AudioLibrary.GetAlbums.description: Retrieve all albums from specified artist or genre

AudioLibrary.GetArtistDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific artist

params.description: Whether or not to include artists only appearing in compilations. If the parameter is not passed or is passed as null the GUI setting will be used
params.name: albumartistsonly

params.description: The amount of recently added albums from which to return the songs
params.name: albums

AudioLibrary.GetSongDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific song

AudioLibrary.GetSongs.description: Retrieve all songs from specified album, artist or genre

AudioLibrary.Scan.description: Scans the audio sources for new library items

AudioPlayer.GetPercentage.description: Retrieve current playback progress in percentage

AudioPlayer.GetTime.description: Retrieves the current and total time of the currently playing file

AudioPlayer.PlayPause.description: Pauses or unpause playback and returns the new state

params.description: Time to seek to in seconds
params.name: value

AudioPlayer.SkipNext.description: Skips to next item on the playlist

AudioPlayer.SkipPrevious.description: Skips to previous item on the playlist

AudioPlayer.State.description: Returns playback state of the audio player (if it is active)

AudioPlaylist.Play.description: Play current or a specific item

params.description: Identification of a song from the audio library
params.name: songid

AudioPlaylist.Repeat.description: Set the repeat mode of the playlist

AudioPlaylist.SkipNext.description: Skip current item and play next item

AudioPlaylist.SkipPrevious.description: Skip current item and play previous item

AudioPlaylist.State.description: Provides information about the current state of the playlist

Files.GetSources.description: Get the sources of the media windows

Input.Home.description: Goes to home window in GUI

getreferences.description: Whether or not to print the schema for referenced types

id.description: Name of a namespace, method or type

PicturePlayer.MoveDown.description: If picture is zoomed move viewport down

PicturePlayer.MoveLeft.description: If picture is zoomed move viewport left otherwise skip previous

PicturePlayer.MoveRight.description: If picture is zoomed move viewport right otherwise skip next

PicturePlayer.MoveUp.description: If picture is zoomed move viewport up

PicturePlayer.SkipNext.description: Skips to next picture in the slideshow

PicturePlayer.SkipPrevious.description: Skips to previous picture in the slideshow

params.description: Adds items from given virtual and/or file based playlist
params.name: items

Playlist.Create.description: Creates a virtual playlist from a given one from a file

System.GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

System.Hibernate.description: Puts the system running XBMC into hibernate mode

System.Shutdown.description: Shuts the system running XBMC down

VideoLibrary.Clean.description: Cleans the video library from non-existent items

VideoLibrary.Export.description: Exports all items from the video library

params.description: Whether to export the data into one or multiple files
params.name: singlefile

params.description: Whether to export thumbnails and fanart images
params.name: images

params.description: Whether to overwrite existing exported files
params.name: overwrite

params.description: Path to the directory to where the data should be exported
params.name: path

VideoLibrary.GetEpisodeDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific tv show episode

VideoLibrary.GetMovieDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific movie

VideoLibrary.GetMovieSetDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific movie set

VideoLibrary.GetMusicVideoDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific music video

VideoLibrary.GetRecentlyAddedEpisodes.description: Retrieve all recently added tv episodes

VideoLibrary.GetRecentlyAddedMusicVideos.description: Retrieve all recently added music videos

VideoLibrary.GetTVShowDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific tv show

VideoLibrary.Scan.description: Scans the video sources for new library items

VideoPlayer.GetPercentage.description: Retrieve current playback progress in percentage

VideoPlayer.GetTime.description: Retrieves the current and total time of the currently playing file

VideoPlayer.PlayPause.description: Pauses or unpause playback and returns the new state

VideoPlayer.SkipNext.description: Skips to next item on the playlist

VideoPlayer.SkipPrevious.description: Skips to previous item on the playlist

VideoPlayer.State.description: Returns playback state of the video player (if it is active)

VideoPlaylist.Play.description: Play current or a specific item

VideoPlaylist.Repeat.description: Set the repeat mode of the playlist

VideoPlaylist.SkipNext.description: Skip current item and play next item

VideoPlaylist.SkipPrevious.description: Skip current item and play previous item

VideoPlaylist.State.description: Provides information about the current state of the playlist

XBMC.GetInfoBooleans.description: Retrieve info booleans about XBMC and the system

returns.description: List of key-value pairs of the retrieved info booleans

XBMC.GetInfoLabels.description: Retrieve info labels about XBMC and the system

params.description: See http://wiki.xbmc.org/index.php?title=InfoLabels for a list of possible info labels
params.name: labels

returns.description: List of key-value pairs of the retrieved info labels

XBMC.Play.description: Starts playback of the given file

XBMC.StartSlideshow.description: Starts slideshow with the images from the given directory

AudioLibrary.OnRemove.description: An audio item has been removed.

AudioLibrary.OnUpdate.description: An audio item has been updated.

Player.OnPause.description: Playback of a media item has been paused. If there is no ID available extra information will be provided.

Player.OnPlay.description: Playback of a media item has been started or the playback speed has changed. If there is no ID available extra information will be provided.

Player.OnSeek.description: The playback position has been changed.

Player.OnStop.description: Playback of a media item has been stopped. If there is no ID available extra information will be provided.

System.OnLowBattery.description: The system is on low battery.

System.OnWake.description: The system woke up from suspension.

VideoLibrary.OnRemove.description: A video item has been removed.

VideoLibrary.OnUpdate.description: A video item has been updated.

file.description: File from which to load a playlist
Path to a file (not a directory) to be added to the playlist

items.description: Requesting the cast and/or resume field will result in increased response times
Requesting the cast, set, showling and/or resume field will result in increased response times
Requesting the resume field will result in increased response times
Requesting the cast field will result in increased response times
